front.title: Seamless Interconnect Underlay to Cloud Overlay Problem Statement

abstract.t: This document describes common approaches deployed by enterprises for interconnection of workloads & applications hosted in Cloud DCs with on-premises DCs & branch offices. This document also describes some of the (network) problems that many enterprises face when they have workloads & applications & data split among hybrid data centers, especially for those enterprises with multiple sites that are already interconnected by VPNs (e.g. MPLS L2VPN/L3VPN) and leased lines. Current operational problems in the field are examined to determine whether there is a need for enhancements to existing protocols or whether a new protocol is necessary to solve them.
